# previousServerChangeToken

**Instance Property**

The server change token.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var previousServerChangeToken: CKServerChangeToken? { get set }
```

## Accessing a Zone Change Configuration

- **resultsLimit**: The maximum number of records that CloudKit retrieves when fetching zone changes.
- **desiredKeys**: An array of the record keys to retrieve.
